00053 void    btHashedOverlappingPairCache::cleanOverlappingPair(btBroadphasePair& pair,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00054 {
00055         if (pair.m_algorithm && dispatcher)
00056         {
00057                 {
00058                         pair.m_algorithm->~btCollisionAlgorithm();
00059                         dispatcher->freeCollisionAlgorithm(pair.m_algorithm);
00060                         pair.m_algorithm=0;
00061                 }
00062         }
00063 }

00068 void    btHashedOverlappingPairCache::cleanProxyFromPairs(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00069 {
00070 
00071         class   CleanPairCallback : public btOverlapCallback
00072         {
00073                 btBroadphaseProxy* m_cleanProxy;
00074                 btOverlappingPairCache* m_pairCache;
00075                 btDispatcher* m_dispatcher;
00076 
00077         public:
00078                 CleanPairCallback(btBroadphaseProxy* cleanProxy,btOverlappingPairCache* pairCache,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00079                         :m_cleanProxy(cleanProxy),
00080                         m_pairCache(pairCache),
00081                         m_dispatcher(dispatcher)
00082                 {
00083                 }
00084                 virtual bool    processOverlap(btBroadphasePair& pair)
00085                 {
00086                         if ((pair.m_pProxy0 == m_cleanProxy) ||
00087                                 (pair.m_pProxy1 == m_cleanProxy))
00088                         {
00089                                 m_pairCache->cleanOverlappingPair(pair,m_dispatcher);
00090                         }
00091                         return false;
00092                 }
00093                 
00094         };
00095 
00096         CleanPairCallback cleanPairs(proxy,this,dispatcher);
00097 
00098         processAllOverlappingPairs(&cleanPairs,dispatcher);
00099 
00100 }

00105 void    btHashedOverlappingPairCache::removeOverlappingPairsContainingProxy(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00106 {
00107 
00108         class   RemovePairCallback : public btOverlapCallback
00109         {
00110                 btBroadphaseProxy* m_obsoleteProxy;
00111 
00112         public:
00113                 RemovePairCallback(btBroadphaseProxy* obsoleteProxy)
00114                         :m_obsoleteProxy(obsoleteProxy)
00115                 {
00116                 }
00117                 virtual bool    processOverlap(btBroadphasePair& pair)
00118                 {
00119                         return ((pair.m_pProxy0 == m_obsoleteProxy) ||
00120                                 (pair.m_pProxy1 == m_obsoleteProxy));
00121                 }
00122                 
00123         };
00124 
00125 
00126         RemovePairCallback removeCallback(proxy);
00127 
00128         processAllOverlappingPairs(&removeCallback,dispatcher);
00129 }

00134 
00135 btBroadphasePair* btHashedOverlappingPairCache::findPair(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy0, btBroadphaseProxy* proxy1)
00136 {
00137         gFindPairs++;
00138         if(proxy0->m_uniqueId>proxy1->m_uniqueId) 
00139                 btSwap(proxy0,proxy1);
00140         int proxyId1 = proxy0->getUid();
00141         int proxyId2 = proxy1->getUid();
00142 
00143         /*if (proxyId1 > proxyId2) 
00144                 btSwap(proxyId1, proxyId2);*/
00145 
00146         int hash = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId1), static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId2)) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1));
00147 
00148         if (hash >= m_hashTable.size())
00149         {
00150                 return NULL;
00151         }
00152 
00153         int index = m_hashTable[hash];
00154         while (index != BT_NULL_PAIR && equalsPair(m_overlappingPairArray[index], proxyId1, proxyId2) == false)
00155         {
00156                 index = m_next[index];
00157         }
00158 
00159         if (index == BT_NULL_PAIR)
00160         {
00161                 return NULL;
00162         }
00163 
00164         btAssert(index < m_overlappingPairArray.size());
00165 
00166         return &m_overlappingPairArray[index];
00167 }

00170 
00171 void    btHashedOverlappingPairCache::growTables()
00172 {
00173 
00174         int newCapacity = m_overlappingPairArray.capacity();
00175 
00176         if (m_hashTable.size() < newCapacity)
00177         {
00178                 //grow hashtable and next table
00179                 int curHashtableSize = m_hashTable.size();
00180 
00181                 m_hashTable.resize(newCapacity);
00182                 m_next.resize(newCapacity);
00183 
00184 
00185                 int i;
00186 
00187                 for (i= 0; i < newCapacity; ++i)
00188                 {
00189                         m_hashTable[i] = BT_NULL_PAIR;
00190                 }
00191                 for (i = 0; i < newCapacity; ++i)
00192                 {
00193                         m_next[i] = BT_NULL_PAIR;
00194                 }
00195 
00196                 for(i=0;i<curHashtableSize;i++)
00197                 {
00198         
00199                         const btBroadphasePair& pair = m_overlappingPairArray[i];
00200                         int proxyId1 = pair.m_pProxy0->getUid();
00201                         int proxyId2 = pair.m_pProxy1->getUid();
00202                         /*if (proxyId1 > proxyId2) 
00203                                 btSwap(proxyId1, proxyId2);*/
00204                         int     hashValue = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId1),static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId2)) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1)); // New hash value with new mask
00205                         m_next[i] = m_hashTable[hashValue];
00206                         m_hashTable[hashValue] = i;
00207                 }
00208 
00209 
00210         }
00211 }
00212 
00213 btBroadphasePair* btHashedOverlappingPairCache::internalAddPair(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy0, btBroadphaseProxy* proxy1)
00214 {
00215         if(proxy0->m_uniqueId>proxy1->m_uniqueId) 
00216                 btSwap(proxy0,proxy1);
00217         int proxyId1 = proxy0->getUid();
00218         int proxyId2 = proxy1->getUid();
00219 
00220         /*if (proxyId1 > proxyId2) 
00221                 btSwap(proxyId1, proxyId2);*/
00222 
00223         int     hash = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId1),static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId2)) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1));      // New hash value with new mask
00224 
00225 
00226         btBroadphasePair* pair = internalFindPair(proxy0, proxy1, hash);
00227         if (pair != NULL)
00228         {
00229                 return pair;
00230         }
00231         /*for(int i=0;i<m_overlappingPairArray.size();++i)
00232                 {
00233                 if(     (m_overlappingPairArray[i].m_pProxy0==proxy0)&&
00234                         (m_overlappingPairArray[i].m_pProxy1==proxy1))
00235                         {
00236                         printf("Adding duplicated %u<>%u\r\n",proxyId1,proxyId2);
00237                         internalFindPair(proxy0, proxy1, hash);
00238                         }
00239                 }*/
00240         int count = m_overlappingPairArray.size();
00241         int oldCapacity = m_overlappingPairArray.capacity();
00242         void* mem = &m_overlappingPairArray.expandNonInitializing();
00243 
00244         //this is where we add an actual pair, so also call the 'ghost'
00245         if (m_ghostPairCallback)
00246                 m_ghostPairCallback->addOverlappingPair(proxy0,proxy1);
00247 
00248         int newCapacity = m_overlappingPairArray.capacity();
00249 
00250         if (oldCapacity < newCapacity)
00251         {
00252                 growTables();
00253                 //hash with new capacity
00254                 hash = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId1),static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId2)) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1));
00255         }
00256         
00257         pair = new (mem) btBroadphasePair(*proxy0,*proxy1);
00258 //      pair->m_pProxy0 = proxy0;
00259 //      pair->m_pProxy1 = proxy1;
00260         pair->m_algorithm = 0;
00261         pair->m_internalTmpValue = 0;
00262         
00263 
00264         m_next[count] = m_hashTable[hash];
00265         m_hashTable[hash] = count;
00266 
00267         return pair;
00268 }

00271 
00272 void* btHashedOverlappingPairCache::removeOverlappingPair(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy0, btBroadphaseProxy* proxy1,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00273 {
00274         gRemovePairs++;
00275         if(proxy0->m_uniqueId>proxy1->m_uniqueId) 
00276                 btSwap(proxy0,proxy1);
00277         int proxyId1 = proxy0->getUid();
00278         int proxyId2 = proxy1->getUid();
00279 
00280         /*if (proxyId1 > proxyId2) 
00281                 btSwap(proxyId1, proxyId2);*/
00282 
00283         int     hash = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId1),static_cast<unsigned int>(proxyId2)) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1));
00284 
00285         btBroadphasePair* pair = internalFindPair(proxy0, proxy1, hash);
00286         if (pair == NULL)
00287         {
00288                 return 0;
00289         }
00290 
00291         cleanOverlappingPair(*pair,dispatcher);
00292 
00293         void* userData = pair->m_internalInfo1;
00294 
00295         btAssert(pair->m_pProxy0->getUid() == proxyId1);
00296         btAssert(pair->m_pProxy1->getUid() == proxyId2);
00297 
00298         int pairIndex = int(pair - &m_overlappingPairArray[0]);
00299         btAssert(pairIndex < m_overlappingPairArray.size());
00300 
00301         // Remove the pair from the hash table.
00302         int index = m_hashTable[hash];
00303         btAssert(index != BT_NULL_PAIR);
00304 
00305         int previous = BT_NULL_PAIR;
00306         while (index != pairIndex)
00307         {
00308                 previous = index;
00309                 index = m_next[index];
00310         }
00311 
00312         if (previous != BT_NULL_PAIR)
00313         {
00314                 btAssert(m_next[previous] == pairIndex);
00315                 m_next[previous] = m_next[pairIndex];
00316         }
00317         else
00318         {
00319                 m_hashTable[hash] = m_next[pairIndex];
00320         }
00321 
00322         // We now move the last pair into spot of the
00323         // pair being removed. We need to fix the hash
00324         // table indices to support the move.
00325 
00326         int lastPairIndex = m_overlappingPairArray.size() - 1;
00327 
00328         if (m_ghostPairCallback)
00329                 m_ghostPairCallback->removeOverlappingPair(proxy0, proxy1,dispatcher);
00330 
00331         // If the removed pair is the last pair, we are done.
00332         if (lastPairIndex == pairIndex)
00333         {
00334                 m_overlappingPairArray.pop_back();
00335                 return userData;
00336         }
00337 
00338         // Remove the last pair from the hash table.
00339         const btBroadphasePair* last = &m_overlappingPairArray[lastPairIndex];
00340                 /* missing swap here too, Nat. */ 
00341         int lastHash = static_cast<int>(getHash(static_cast<unsigned int>(last->m_pProxy0->getUid()), static_cast<unsigned int>(last->m_pProxy1->getUid())) & (m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1));
00342 
00343         index = m_hashTable[lastHash];
00344         btAssert(index != BT_NULL_PAIR);
00345 
00346         previous = BT_NULL_PAIR;
00347         while (index != lastPairIndex)
00348         {
00349                 previous = index;
00350                 index = m_next[index];
00351         }
00352 
00353         if (previous != BT_NULL_PAIR)
00354         {
00355                 btAssert(m_next[previous] == lastPairIndex);
00356                 m_next[previous] = m_next[lastPairIndex];
00357         }
00358         else
00359         {
00360                 m_hashTable[lastHash] = m_next[lastPairIndex];
00361         }
00362 
00363         // Copy the last pair into the remove pair's spot.
00364         m_overlappingPairArray[pairIndex] = m_overlappingPairArray[lastPairIndex];
00365 
00366         // Insert the last pair into the hash table
00367         m_next[pairIndex] = m_hashTable[lastHash];
00368         m_hashTable[lastHash] = pairIndex;
00369 
00370         m_overlappingPairArray.pop_back();
00371 
00372         return userData;
00373 }
00374 //#include <stdio.h>
00375 #include "LinearMath/btQuickprof.h"
00376 void    btHashedOverlappingPairCache::processAllOverlappingPairs(btOverlapCallback* callback,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00377 {
00378         BT_PROFILE("btHashedOverlappingPairCache::processAllOverlappingPairs");
00379         int i;
00380 
00381 //      printf("m_overlappingPairArray.size()=%d\n",m_overlappingPairArray.size());
00382         for (i=0;i<m_overlappingPairArray.size();)
00383         {
00384         
00385                 btBroadphasePair* pair = &m_overlappingPairArray[i];
00386                 if (callback->processOverlap(*pair))
00387                 {
00388                         removeOverlappingPair(pair->m_pProxy0,pair->m_pProxy1,dispatcher);
00389 
00390                         gOverlappingPairs--;
00391                 } else
00392                 {
00393                         i++;
00394                 }
00395         }
00396 }
00397 
00398 void    btHashedOverlappingPairCache::sortOverlappingPairs(btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00399 {
00401         btBroadphasePairArray tmpPairs;
00402         int i;
00403         for (i=0;i<m_overlappingPairArray.size();i++)
00404         {
00405                 tmpPairs.push_back(m_overlappingPairArray[i]);
00406         }
00407 
00408         for (i=0;i<tmpPairs.size();i++)
00409         {
00410                 removeOverlappingPair(tmpPairs[i].m_pProxy0,tmpPairs[i].m_pProxy1,dispatcher);
00411         }
00412         
00413         for (i = 0; i < m_next.size(); i++)
00414         {
00415                 m_next[i] = BT_NULL_PAIR;
00416         }
00417 
00418         tmpPairs.quickSort(btBroadphasePairSortPredicate());
00419 
00420         for (i=0;i<tmpPairs.size();i++)
00421         {
00422                 addOverlappingPair(tmpPairs[i].m_pProxy0,tmpPairs[i].m_pProxy1);
00423         }
00424 
00425         
00426 }
00427 
00428 
00429 void*   btSortedOverlappingPairCache::removeOverlappingPair(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy0,btBroadphaseProxy* proxy1, btDispatcher* dispatcher )
00430 {
00431         if (!hasDeferredRemoval())
00432         {
00433                 btBroadphasePair findPair(*proxy0,*proxy1);
00434 
00435                 int findIndex = m_overlappingPairArray.findLinearSearch(findPair);
00436                 if (findIndex < m_overlappingPairArray.size())
00437                 {
00438                         gOverlappingPairs--;
00439                         btBroadphasePair& pair = m_overlappingPairArray[findIndex];
00440                         void* userData = pair.m_internalInfo1;
00441                         cleanOverlappingPair(pair,dispatcher);
00442                         if (m_ghostPairCallback)
00443                                 m_ghostPairCallback->removeOverlappingPair(proxy0, proxy1,dispatcher);
00444                         
00445                         m_overlappingPairArray.swap(findIndex,m_overlappingPairArray.capacity()-1);
00446                         m_overlappingPairArray.pop_back();
00447                         return userData;
00448                 }
00449         }
00450 
00451         return 0;
00452 }

00460 
00461 btBroadphasePair*       btSortedOverlappingPairCache::addOverlappingPair(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy0,btBroadphaseProxy* proxy1)
00462 {
00463         //don't add overlap with own
00464         btAssert(proxy0 != proxy1);
00465 
00466         if (!needsBroadphaseCollision(proxy0,proxy1))
00467                 return 0;
00468         
00469         void* mem = &m_overlappingPairArray.expandNonInitializing();
00470         btBroadphasePair* pair = new (mem) btBroadphasePair(*proxy0,*proxy1);
00471         
00472         gOverlappingPairs++;
00473         gAddedPairs++;
00474         
00475         if (m_ghostPairCallback)
00476                 m_ghostPairCallback->addOverlappingPair(proxy0, proxy1);
00477         return pair;
00478         
00479 }
00480 
00485  btBroadphasePair*      btSortedOverlappingPairCache::findPair(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy0,btBroadphaseProxy* proxy1)
00486 {
00487         if (!needsBroadphaseCollision(proxy0,proxy1))
00488                 return 0;
00489 
00490         btBroadphasePair tmpPair(*proxy0,*proxy1);
00491         int findIndex = m_overlappingPairArray.findLinearSearch(tmpPair);
00492 
00493         if (findIndex < m_overlappingPairArray.size())
00494         {
00495                 //btAssert(it != m_overlappingPairSet.end());
00496                  btBroadphasePair* pair = &m_overlappingPairArray[findIndex];
00497                 return pair;
00498         }
00499         return 0;
00500 }

00512 
00513 void    btSortedOverlappingPairCache::processAllOverlappingPairs(btOverlapCallback* callback,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00514 {
00515 
00516         int i;
00517 
00518         for (i=0;i<m_overlappingPairArray.size();)
00519         {
00520         
00521                 btBroadphasePair* pair = &m_overlappingPairArray[i];
00522                 if (callback->processOverlap(*pair))
00523                 {
00524                         cleanOverlappingPair(*pair,dispatcher);
00525                         pair->m_pProxy0 = 0;
00526                         pair->m_pProxy1 = 0;
00527                         m_overlappingPairArray.swap(i,m_overlappingPairArray.size()-1);
00528                         m_overlappingPairArray.pop_back();
00529                         gOverlappingPairs--;
00530                 } else
00531                 {
00532                         i++;
00533                 }
00534         }
00535 }

00540 btSortedOverlappingPairCache::btSortedOverlappingPairCache():
00541         m_blockedForChanges(false),
00542         m_hasDeferredRemoval(true),
00543         m_overlapFilterCallback(0),
00544         m_ghostPairCallback(0)
00545 {
00546         int initialAllocatedSize= 2;
00547         m_overlappingPairArray.reserve(initialAllocatedSize);
00548 }

00552 }

00554 void    btSortedOverlappingPairCache::cleanOverlappingPair(btBroadphasePair& pair,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00555 {
00556         if (pair.m_algorithm)
00557         {
00558                 {
00559                         pair.m_algorithm->~btCollisionAlgorithm();
00560                         dispatcher->freeCollisionAlgorithm(pair.m_algorithm);
00561                         pair.m_algorithm=0;
00562                         gRemovePairs--;
00563                 }
00564         }
00565 }

00568 void    btSortedOverlappingPairCache::cleanProxyFromPairs(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00569 {
00570 
00571         class   CleanPairCallback : public btOverlapCallback
00572         {
00573                 btBroadphaseProxy* m_cleanProxy;
00574                 btOverlappingPairCache* m_pairCache;
00575                 btDispatcher* m_dispatcher;
00576 
00577         public:
00578                 CleanPairCallback(btBroadphaseProxy* cleanProxy,btOverlappingPairCache* pairCache,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00579                         :m_cleanProxy(cleanProxy),
00580                         m_pairCache(pairCache),
00581                         m_dispatcher(dispatcher)
00582                 {
00583                 }
00584                 virtual bool    processOverlap(btBroadphasePair& pair)
00585                 {
00586                         if ((pair.m_pProxy0 == m_cleanProxy) ||
00587                                 (pair.m_pProxy1 == m_cleanProxy))
00588                         {
00589                                 m_pairCache->cleanOverlappingPair(pair,m_dispatcher);
00590                         }
00591                         return false;
00592                 }
00593                 
00594         };
00595 
00596         CleanPairCallback cleanPairs(proxy,this,dispatcher);
00597 
00598         processAllOverlappingPairs(&cleanPairs,dispatcher);
00599 
00600 }
